name: Akhirat: Boundaries
description:
Genre :

Thriller, Story-driven, Puzzle game

Summary of Gameplay

Akhirat : Boundaries is a typical story driven game and has puzzle in it. Allows the player to choose the action and create a different storyline. A player as a sidekick character needs to help the main character to make his afterlife journey.

Features

Environment Storytelling, Puzzle, Multiple Endings, Character Personalities, sidekick player.

Mechanics

This game allow player make decision, and that decision earn the point for your personalities. There is Big 5 Personalities point you can get. Each point combination have different meaning and different story for the main player
